caption: visited sat afternoon. service is typically above par. prices are appropriate for the quality. reminds me of a cafe in chicago i loved to visit.

Why does this place not have more reviews?!?!?!? This is my second time here in 1 week and I HAVE to leave a review! 🍕 I’ve visited Italy and tasted authentic pizza and I have hated American pizza ever since. This bistro right here is baking and selling you the truth 💞👌🏽✨I’m in love once again and never want pizza from any other place. They understand that real pizza has thin crust, that they are smaller in size, and the ingredients of the toppings are fresh and simple and baked to a loving bakedness. They apply just enough sauce they don’t inundate and flood the dang pizza like these American chains. I have had the fungi and the o.g. 👌🏽👌🏽👌🏽👌🏽👌🏽I only have a pic of the og, it’s what I ordered today on my second trip. Also have pic of the pizza menu. Pizza comes with a nice small salad and their sodas are buy 1 get 1 for a penny:)
